Custom CSS and Javascript
These settings allow adding custom CSS and Javascript that will be used within the Form.io portal. You must also include the CSS or javascript within your app to see the same functionality. Common uses of these settings are to have the form preview have the same styling as your application and to include custom components into the form builder.

It is recommended to wrap all CSS classes with a custom class specific to a project. Otherwise theses styles will apply to all projects once loaded. You can use the .{{ currentProject.name}}Form class to target only forms in this project.

Custom Javascript is useful for adding custom components to a project.
